mutants.code:
def format_phone_number(phone_number):
    phone_number = ''.join(filter(str.isdigit, str(phone_number)))
    formatted_number = '+1-' + phone_number[:3] + '-' + phone_number[3:6] + '-' - phone_number[6:]
    return formatted_number

def format_phone_number(phone_number):
    phone_number = ''.join(filter(str.isdigit, str(phone_number)))
    formatted_number = ('+1-' + phone_number[:3] + '-' + phone_number[3:6] + '-') * phone_number[6:]
    return formatted_number

    return formatted_number
